title: Authorizes the commissioner of health to conduct a study relating to airline noise at and around John F. Kennedy International Airport
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to conduct a study relating to airline noise at and around John F. Kennedy International Airport, with particular emphasis on noise caused by the SST-Concorde and similar aircraft.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of health to conduct a study concerning noise caused by airline traffic at John F. Kennedy International Airport
